DataElement.preferredName: Pathology Facility Identifier Fifth Report Submitter Facility Identifier Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An identifying code (for example, a CLIA number) that uniquely identifies the pathology facility sending the fifth report of the case.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A specialty concerned with the nature and cause of disease as expressed by changes in cellular or tissue structure and function caused by the disease process. (MSH98)_Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination.

Concepts.definition: The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination.

Property.preferredDefinition: Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Fifth Report Submitter Facility Identifier Number
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Following the fourth position in an ordering or series; coming next after the fourth and just before the sixth in position._Report; a short account._A person who presents or submits something (e.g., a proposal or protocol) for formal consideration or review by others._Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the identification of patients' medical records and forms.

Concepts.definition: Following the fourth position in an ordering or series; coming next after the fourth and just before the sixth in position.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.
A person who presents or submits something (e.g., a proposal or protocol) for formal consideration or review by others.
Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Division of Cancer Control and Population Sciences

ReferenceDocuments.name: Rationale
ReferenceDocuments.description: Describes the origin of the fifth pathology report contributing to this cancer abstract. Clinical Laboratory Improvement Act Identification Numbers (CLIAs) are used for laboratory reporting.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NAACCR 12.1, Data Stds/Dict.
ReferenceDocuments.description: For additional details see NAACCR, Standards for Cancer Registries Volume II, Version 12.1 Data Standards and Data Dictionary (6/2010)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Path Reporting Fac ID 5 Comment
ReferenceDocuments.description: Information in this data item should refer to the path report described in data items 7104, 7094, 7194, and 7484.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NAACCR 16, Data Stds/Dict.
ReferenceDocuments.description: For additional details see NAACCR, Standards for Cancer Registries Volume II, Version 16 Data Standards and Data Dictionary (01/2016)

DataElement.origin: NAACCR:North American Association of Central Cancer Registries
